channel.title: CVE Feed for baserCMS Users Community -- baserCMS plugin Mail
channel.description: The latest CVEs for baserCMS Users Community -- baserCMS plugin Mail

item.title: CVE-2016-4886|2024-08-06T00:46:39.334Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms%20plugin%20mail
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in baserCMS plugin Mail version 3.0.10 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2016-4877|2024-08-06T00:46:39.687Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms%20plugin%20mail
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in baserCMS plugin Mail version 3.0.10 and earlier allows remote authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2016-4879|2024-08-06T00:46:39.316Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms%20plugin%20mail
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in baserCMS plugin Mail version 3.0.10 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.
